mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id AS userId, token, expired_date AS expiredDate, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM user_email_verification A WHERE user_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE uid = #{UId} )

SELECT A.user_id AS userId, B.name AS companyName , A.company_id AS companyId , A.role_id AS roleId , A.uid, A.upw, A.name, A.pic , A.email, A.phone, A.point FROM user A INNER JOIN company B ON A.company_id = B.company_id WHERE A.uid = #{uid}

SELECT A.user_id AS userId, B.name AS companyName , A.company_id AS companyId , A.role_id AS roleId , A.uid, A.upw, A.name, A.pic , A.email, A.phone, A.point FROM user A INNER JOIN company B ON A.company_id = B.company_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT A.user_id AS userId, B.name AS companyName , A.company_id AS companyId , A.role_id AS roleId , A.uid, A.upw, A.name, A.pic , A.email, A.phone, A.point FROM user A INNER JOIN company B ON A.company_id = B.company_id WHERE A.email = #{email} AND A.name = #{name}
